entity_a.original_name: 鸿之微科技（上海）股份有限公司
entity_a.description: Developer of material design and process simulation software, providing high-performance computing cloud platforms, computing services, and customized computing solutions for the advanced material industry. The company focuses on developing materials, processing design evaluation, and simulation experiments.

entity_b.description: Developer of advanced atomistic and quantum simulation tools and software for next-generation nanoscale materials, devices, and quantum technology (QTCAD). Their software predicts properties and performance of materials and quantum devices, utilized globally by universities, government labs, and private companies to reduce R&D costs. (Note: While the prompt specified 'Location: China', Nanoacademic Technologies Inc. is headquartered in Montreal, Canada. However, they have a global presence and partners, suggesting potential activities or partnerships in China.)
